name: Hypochondrinomicon EGX prototype
description:
WEBSITE: HERE

DISCORD: HERE

This version of Hypochondrinomicon is the prototype we had taken to EGX 2019, but with a few balance changes and ease of access changes.

Choose between Darren the pyromancer fighter, Nora the hydromancer spellcaster, Jack the ferromancer engineer, and Raven the necromancer assassin. Give your hero commands to defeat the opposition.
